00011 bool instr_load(SIVM *sivm, REG *dest, const cmd_word source)
00012 {
00013         *dest = source.brut;
00014     return true;
00015 }

00021 {
00022         *dest = source.brut;
00023     return true;

00029 bool instr_add(SIVM *sivm, REG *dest, const cmd_word source)
00030 {
00031         *dest += source.brut;
00032         sivm->sr = *dest;
00033     return true;

00040 {

00053 bool instr_jmp(SIVM *sivm, REG *dest, const cmd_word source)
00054 {
00055         if (source.brut > MEMSIZE) {
00056                 logm("Jumping too far!", 0);
00057                 return false;
00058         }
00059         sivm->pc = source.brut;
00060     return true;
00061 }
00062 
00066 bool instr_jeq(SIVM *sivm, REG *dest, const cmd_word source)
00067 {
00068         if (sivm->sr == 0)
00069                 return instr_jmp(sivm, dest, source);
00070     return false;
00071 }
00072 
00076 bool instr_push(SIVM *sivm, REG *dest, const cmd_word source)
00077 {
00078         int newSp = sivm->sp + SP_INCR;
00079         if (newSp > MEMSIZE || newSp < 0) {
00080                 logm("Stack pointer after incrementation is illegal", 0);
00081                 return false;
00082         }
00083         sivm->mem[newSp] = source;
00084         sivm->sp = newSp;
00085         return true;
00086 }
00087 
00091 bool instr_pop(SIVM *sivm, REG *dest, const cmd_word source)
00092 {
00093         int newSp = sivm->sp - SP_INCR;
00094         if (newSp > MEMSIZE || newSp < 0) {
00095                 logm("Stack pointer inconsistency", 0);
00096                 return false;
00097         }
00098         *dest = source.brut;
00099         sivm->sp = newSp;
00100         return true;
00101 }

00117 bool instr_mov(SIVM *sivm, REG *dest, const cmd_word source)
00118 {
00119         *dest = source.brut;
00120         sivm->sr = *dest;
00121     return true;

00135 Instr instructions[] = {
00136         [LOAD] = {instr_load,   FM_REGDIR | FM_REGIMM | FM_REGIND,                              "LOAD"},
00137         [STORE] = {instr_store, FM_DIRIMM | FM_DIRREG | FM_INDIMM | FM_INDREG,  "STORE"},
00138         [ADD] = {instr_add,             FM_REGREG | FM_REGIMM | FM_REGDIR | FM_REGIND,  "ADD"},
00139         [SUB] = {instr_sub,             FM_REGREG | FM_REGIMM | FM_REGDIR | FM_REGIND,  "SUB"},
00140         [JMP] = {instr_jmp,             FM_REGREG | FM_REGIMM | FM_REGDIR | FM_REGIND,  "JMP"},
00141         [JEQ] = {instr_jeq,             FM_REGREG | FM_REGIMM | FM_REGDIR | FM_REGIND,  "JEQ"},
00142         [MOV] = {instr_mov,             FM_REGREG | FM_REGIMM,                                                  "MOV"}
00143 };

00152 bool checkModes(const cmd_word m)
00153 {
00154     return getInstruction(m).modes & (1 << m.codage.mode);
00155 }
00156 
00161 Instr getInstruction(const cmd_word m)
00162 {
00163         return instructions[m.codage.codeop];
00164 }
